devotional.focus: Focus on spiritual growth, faith, encouragement, and biblical teachings. Create content that uplifts, inspires, and provides practical spiritual guidance.
devotional.audience: Believers, spiritual seekers, those looking for daily encouragement and guidance.
video_ideas_base: Scripture Study - What Does the Bible Say About {topic}?
Testimony Series - How God Changed My Life
Bible Verse Breakdown - Deep Dive Into {verse}

fitness.focus: Create workout guides, fitness tips, nutrition advice, and wellness content. Focus on practical, actionable advice for different fitness levels.
fitness.audience: Fitness enthusiasts, beginners, health-conscious individuals seeking guidance.

educational.focus: Teach and educate your audience on specific topics. Create clear, well-structured lessons that break down complex concepts.
educational.audience: Students, lifelong learners, professionals seeking to upgrade skills.

cooking.focus: Share recipes, cooking techniques, food reviews, and meal prep ideas. Make content accessible and appetizing.
cooking.audience: Home cooks, food enthusiasts, people seeking meal inspiration.
video_ideas_base: How to Make {dish} Like a Pro

vlog.focus: Share your daily life, experiences, adventures, and personal insights. Create relatable and engaging lifestyle content.
vlog.audience: People interested in your lifestyle, adventures, personality.

gaming.focus: Game reviews, playthroughs, tips & tricks, streaming highlights. Engage with gaming community.
gaming.audience: Gamers of all levels, esports fans, streamers.

default.focus: Create engaging, valuable content that resonates with your target audience. Focus on consistency and quality.
default.audience: Your target demographic seeking your unique perspective and expertise.
